caption.p: Figure 1: TLC of crude extracts exposed to UV at 360 nm; mobile phase: methanol : dichloromethane (95 : 5, v/v). Figure 2: TLC of crude extracts exposed to UV at 254 nm; mobile phase: methanol : dichloromethane (95 : 5, v/v). Figure 3: TLC of crude extracts after spraying with 5% sulphuric acid. Figure 4: TLC of crude extracts exposed to UV at 360 nm after spraying with 5% sulphuric acid. Figure 5: TLC of crude extracts exposed to UV at 254 nm after spraying with 5% sulphuric acid. Table 1: interpretation of TLC results of crude extracts.
